official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release on behalf of the United States all restrictions contained in a previous conveyance of land to the town of Jerome, Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to release by quitclaim deed all conditions under which specified land was conveyed to Jerome, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to release on behalf of the United States all restrictions contained in a previous conveyance of land to the town of Jerome, Arizona.
